entry.title: Come.. Let's Dance
entry.content:
Just another sketch to break the monotony of my life. (Somehow felt good no matter how bad this turned out)

(My scanner sucks)

entry.title: Prince of the Woodland Realm
entry.content:
http://sudharsh.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/legolas1.png?w=247">

http://sudharsh.files.wordpress.com/2009/01/out.jpeg?w=204">

Legolas Greenleaf long under tree

In joy thou hast lived. Beware of the Sea!

If thou hearest the cry of the gull on the shore,

Thy heart shall rest in the forest no more."

My favorite character from Lord of the Rings. Not as good as the original, but I drew these after a very long time.. :)

I also felt like creating a deviant profile for myself.
